products.title: Burst Pastel Yellow Vertical Blind
products.description: As soft as a yellow can be before it starts drifting into beige territory, this gorgeously chill tone relies on its washed out colour to add a certain flexibility that yellows tend to lack. Perfect for adding a gentle coloured accent to rooms with a more solid colour scheme, it mixes well with browns, blues or greys to soften the tone of the room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Yellow Submarine Vertical Blind
products.description: Make a statement in your home with the vibrant yellow colour in the burst yellow submarine. This blind is sure to add some zing to your interior and with a name like yellow submarine youll be singing your way round your home before you know it. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Amor Yellow Submarine Vertical Blind
products.description: Make a statement in your home with the vibrant yellow colour in the amor yellow submarine. This blind is sure to add some zing to your interior and with a name like yellow submarine youll be singing your way round your home before you know it. This is a blackout fabric and is perfect for bedrooms as it will stop all of the light from passing through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Amor Pastel Yellow Vertical Blind
products.description: As soft as a yellow can be before it starts drifting into beige territory, this gorgeously chill tone relies on its washed out colour to add a certain flexibility that yellows tend to lack. Perfect for adding a gentle coloured accent to rooms with a more solid colour scheme, it mixes well with browns, blues or greys to soften the tone of the room. In direct sunlight, the yellow within the mellow will come to the fore, giving it a new lease of life and adding a startling energy to the space it occupies.

products.title: Crown Burgundy Gold Vertical Blind
products.description: This verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout and with a uniqu patern running up each vane, these blinds are great in any window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.
